data.title: Jessen (Elster) → Berlin Hbf by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Jessen (Elster) to Berlin Hbf in 1h 35m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Jessen (Elster) to Berlin Hbf today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Jessen (Elster) to Berlin Hbf by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 2 hours 38 minutes to travel from Jessen (Elster) to Berlin Hbf by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 1 hour 35 minutes though. You'll usually find 22 trains per day running along the 54 miles (86 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Berlin Hbf, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. You'll be travelling with ICE, DB or Regiojet on your way to Berlin Hbf, as these are the main rail operators on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Jessen (Elster) to Berlin Hbf.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Berlin Hbf by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
